Key:
Come now, let's go, darling. Who cares? Just
leave the other girls～

I don't know about that. Shido wants to spend
his life with us.
Inviting. Now, Shido. Come this way.
No! Shido is going on a date with me!

Shido is going on a date with me. It has been
decided.
I-It's not settling down at all...

(What do I do? I don't think I can call anyone
to settle this. I guess... making a run for it
might be best. But... where would I run...?)

(My little sister Kotori... Yeah. I have a feeling
she'd lecture me.)
(Wait a minute. Little sister... That's right!)
I know!
Hey! He ran for it!
Escape. Shido has attempted an escape.

So, Ani-sama... What the hell do you want,
calling me out of the blue? I'm pretty busy,
you know.

S-Sorry, Mana. You see, um... I could only ask
you.

W-Well, it's not like I mind. Mana is Onii-sama's
little sister by blood. Of course I'd do anything
for you.

(This awkward girl is my true sister... Mana
Takamina. I was adopted by the Itsuka family,
so I don't have many memories of my childhood.)

Thanks so much. When I first met you, I was so
surprised, but I'm really glad to have you in my
life.

Wh-What the hell are you talking about. You're
making me blush. So, what do you want?
Oh, you see...
Yeah.
Mana, go on a date with me.
I see...
WHAT?!
I can only ask you.

Wh-Wh-What the hell are you blabbering on
about, Onii-sama?!

Please. I have to tell everyone that I have plans
with you, or I'm going to have to make the
ultimate choice with the other girls.

I don't friggin' get it. What the hell is going
on?!
Sorry but I don't have time to expla—Ahh!
SHIDO!
Th-They're here.
What happened, Shido?! You just ran away!
We haven't heard your answer yet.

Hehe... Shido, it's pointless to run away.
We wouldn't run or hide anywhere.
Pointing out. Kaguya, that makes no sense.
Sh-Shut up! Be quiet, Yuzuru!

*Pant, pant*... darling... Not faiiirrrr.
You can't just run out of the blueeee.
Wh-What is going on?
Well... Exactly what you see...
Uh, explain...
Sorry, everyone!

I feel bad, but as you can tell, I already had
plans with Mana, so I can't go on a date with
any of you.
WHAT?!
N-Nii-sama...?
Now let's go, Mana. Please... Just play along.

Hey Onii-sama... This just means you're using
my body...!
Shhh! Sorry, just bear with me... Please.
Shido, what are you two talking about?

N-Nothing. Anyways, we have plans! Right?
Let's go, Mana. Man, it's been a while since
it was just us, brother and sister!

F-Friggin right, Nii-sama! onee-sama...
Later, everyone!

(And so I found a way out of the situation.
But as I did that, Mana looked at me
judgingly...)
